ModMetaData.name: Misc Patches
ModMetaData.author: WinnieTheJinPing
ModMetaData.description:
Discord for support/suggestions: https://discord.gg/Jdj2F2t
You shouldn't be able to see this at all. This is a collection of patches I run when I play. It is overpowered. It do be like that.
Check the Steam description for the up-to-date list of what this does cause I sometimes forget to update this.
Bulk Cooking - Adds x100 recipes for the Simple, Fine, and Lavish meals. Ingredients are balanced, work... Not so much
Body Parts - Removed deterioration. Look. If it can't rot, bugger off with the deterioration yeah.
Stone Crafting - 20 stone blocks from one chunk. How about 1000.
Vegetarian Meals I got a 600% fertility tilled soil. Im pushing rice like nobody's business. I need to dump it somewhere. Why not pure vegetarian meals??? - Adds vegetarian meals, they're made with plant stuff. Yeah. English is my first language and I cannot brain. - Adds a 1, 4, and 100 crafting variant of it as well.
Discord for support/suggestions: https://discord.gg/Jdj2F2t
